description:
The new all mountain mid socks for men do more than just keep your feet warm with their soft merino wool, seamless circular knit and special knitted construction.

The new all mountain mid socks for men keep your feet warm despite the cold and the frost.
Particularly fine merino wool at 21.5 microns in thickness feels pleasant on the skin and makes these warm socks elastic and stable. The natural properties of merino wool really come into their own in the foot area, naturally regulating the temperature and moisture while also neutralizing unpleasant odors.
The circular-knitted all mountain mid socks for men are designed to fit perfectly without any irritating seams, thus reducing areas that rub or dig in. Our sculptured terry lining is a special knitted construction that traps heat extremely effectively and creates the perfect climate with air pockets.
The ankle and arch support ensures a good fit and prevents the socks from slipping or creasing. You can also say goodbye to blisters in the toe area in future thanks to the flat toe seam.
The all mountain mid socks for men are thus the perfect companion for mountain tours or alpine tours in the cold season.
name: Ortovox All Mountain Mid Socks - Mens
